friends.sql: select f.*,u.*, concat('',u.Email,'') Email, concat(Rang(u.Rang),concat_ws(' ',u.FirstName,u.LastName),'',' (',u.Login,')') as User from jr_friends f left outer join ut_users u on f.FriendID=u.UserID where f.UserID='$user;' order by Login
